data.comment: Adam Armstrong nets and Blackburn now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 21, Blackburn take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Tyrhys Dolan.
Adam Armstrong puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Anthony Stewart (Wycombe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Darius Charles (Wycombe) has been sent off!
In the minute 58, Ryan Tafazolli is replacing Scott Kashket for the away team.
Wycombe make their second substitution with Uche Ikpeazu replacing Matt Bloomfield.
Goal! Blackburn extend their lead to 4-0 through Derrick Williams.
In the minute 68, Harry Chapman is on a sub for Ben Brereton for Blackburn.
The home team replace Joe Rothwell with John Buckley.
Nick Freeman is on a sub for Fred Onyedinma for Wycombe.
In the minute 79, Blackburn make their third substitution with Jacob Davenport replacing Lewis Holtby.
Goal! Adam Armstrong extends Blackburn's lead to 5-0.
It's 5-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
